Text:
Cheers for not making one big RAR file!

Now I could pick a few books that I really wanted, without having to dowload almost 19 Gigs.

Thanks for sharing!

Thanks for this huge pack, it's awesome!

anyway, wondering if there will be a part 2 for this? :)
youre better off mastering 1 or 2 books rather than thinking about 40 000 like this. nice to have on hand though.
